com.bookworm.controllers

Class NotificationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bookworm.controllers.NotificationController

  • @RestController
 @Scope(value="singleton")
 @RequestMapping(value="books/{bookId}/notifications")
public class NotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles all basic notification API endpoints GET and POST.
    Since:
    1.7

    • Method Detail

      • getNotificationsByBook

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Notification> getNotificationsByBook(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                               long bookId)
        Fetches all notifications by the given book id.
        Parameters:
        bookId - books's id.
        Returns:
        array of notifications as json.

      • setNotification

        @Transactional
 @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Notification> setNotification(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                          long bookId)
        Used to leave a notification for the given book. Allowed only when book stock is 0. When book stock is increased user gets a notification by email, that the book is in stock.
        Parameters:
        bookId - book's id.
        Returns:
        notification as json.
